before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1glkl","text":"Materials:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dvk4a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7n29h","text":"digested PCR-product (100-200ng in 20ul)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"brjgc","text":"96 well filter plates","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4582b","text":"96 well collection plates (IBL 96*0.2ml frosted Subkirted thin well)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c5c0o","text":"Sephadex G50 (GE, 37.5g into 500ml autoclaved MilliQ H2O)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a1brt","text":"Multipette 10ml/1ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dr762","text":"Multichanel 200ul/10ul","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2oqfd","text":"HiDi Formamide (Prepare a master mix: 10ul HiDi Formamide + 0.3ul Size Standard, GS_1200 LIZ, AB per sample nebo 165ul HiDi Formamide + 5ul Size Standard for one run = 16 samples)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"20sch","text":"Purification of PCR-product after restriction digest. Samples proceeded on the capillary sequencer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: SoWa RI Anaerobic and Molecular Microbiology (public)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7pm8g","text":"The Sephadex solution is stored in a glass bottle in the fridge. Before you start the purification let the Sephadex solution come to room temperature and shake well before each usage!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.name: MultiScreen-HV Filter Plate, 0.45 µm, clear, non-sterile
Sephadex G-50 M DNA Grade, 100 g

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"SdGnB","text":"MATERIALS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":null,"data":null},{"key":"jp4XY","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":null},{"key":"PhJlp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":null}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"can_edit":0,"cas_number":"","guid":"419FEEDF341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"MultiScreen-HV Filter Plate, 0.45 µm, clear, non-sterile","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"MAHVN4550","url":"http://www.merckmillipore.com/CZ/cs/product/MultiScreen-HV-Filter-Plate-0.45nbspm-clear-non-sterile,MM_NF-MAHVN4550","vendor":{"id":112,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"link":"http://www.merckmillipore.com","name":"Merck Millipore"}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"can_edit":0,"cas_number":"","guid":"419FEF32341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Sephadex G-50 M DNA Grade, 100 g","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"17004502","url":"https://www.gelifesciences.com/en/ro/shop/molecular-biology/extraction/genomic-dna/sephadex-g-50-m-dna-grade-p-05790","vendor":{"id":51,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"link":"http://www.gehealthcare.com","name":"Ge Healthcare"}}}}}

related_materials.name: Sephadex G-50 M DNA Grade, 100 g
MultiScreen-HV Filter Plate, 0.45 µm, clear, non-sterile

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1lahk","text":"Load 200μl Sephadex solution onto the 96 well filter plates (shake the Sephadex solution well before each usage!) (use the EppendorfMultipette with a 10ml tip), the no. of wells you load depends on the no. of samples,","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"612ai","text":"load filter plate on 96 well collection plate, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aaq5e","text":"place the lit on top of this 'plate sandwich' and","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3ac5i","text":"place in swing out rotor base.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dvuru","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"429E80AE903F4212AC9092EF1BFC9910","id":"6674","label":"Sephadex solution","unit":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sl4q","text":"Spin at 230rcf(g) for 1 min 15sec (Eppendorf centrifuge 5810). Don't forget to balance the centrifuge by placing a dummy  'plate sandwich'  on the rotor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2j493","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5ak6f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"420 x g","guid":"47A4B4FC341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"60","guid":"AD7716D40F6A462F8F0C82DBB258A423","id":"15660","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe7dk","text":"Place Sephadex G-50 containing 96 well filter plate on the collection plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4e7p","text":"Load 20μl sample in the centre of the Sephadex column. Just drop the 20ul on tj top of the gel. Avoid to destroy the Sd. gel by penetrating it  with the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":96,"length":69}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"546a7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","guid":"976E61A1CBF744B9A4C142186582EF93","id":"6675","label":"sample","unit":"1"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eti8e","text":"Go immediately to sample preparation or store the samples at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37cj4","text":"Spin at 420 rcf (g) for 1 min (Eppendorf centrifuge 5810).  Note: There will be some extra buffer that comes through from the Sephadex resulting in a total sample volume of ∼ 35-40 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ifb9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3heu8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"60","guid":"7DFC6A0C7B35470296C2F909124D7892","id":"15661","label":""}},"1":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"420 x g","guid":"47A4B53C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u0o5","text":"Remove the Sephadex from the filter plate and rinse the filter plate and collection plate as well (with MQ). Both plates could be reused several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1j2bv","text":"Transfer the purified samples back to the original caps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckdk4","text":"Aliquot 10μl of HiDi Formamide master mix into a new 96 well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ehr6","text":"Add the 4μl of your purified sample per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2mt9l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"261E83DE7E614087ACECE7754032B15C","id":"6676","label":"purified sample","unit":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnba7","text":"Transfer samples immediately on ice and let the chill for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e1hgb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4mj59","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"73363672B6044628845163AA49BBA97E","id":"1341","label":"on ice","temperature":"0","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"300","guid":"199F4FA915C54CB5A3F99AAB30DE8FEE","id":"15663","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tkfr","text":"Store samples in the fridge, prepare the sample sheet and run the samples at ABI 3130XL Capillary Sequencer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
